items.title: Trump’s Greenland Grab Ignores One Crucial Detail: He Doesn’t Have the Authority
items.description: Whether by purchase or conquest, adding territory to the United States requires congressional approval.

items.title: No, America Is Not Adopting a ‘Spheres-of-Influence’ Doctrine
items.description: There’s no evidence Donald Trump is interested in focusing solely on the Western Hemisphere while ceding the rest of the world to China and Russia.

items.title: The End of a Spiritual Retreat in the Aspen Mountains
items.description: St. Benedict’s Monastery was one of the last vestiges of Western spiritual tradition in an increasingly secular area.

items.title: Triumphs and Tin Ears at Princeton’s New Art Museum
items.description: A look at the permanent collection in its brand-new galleries.

items.title: How to Make Fusion Great Again and Beat China
items.description: The U.S. can achieve preeminence in fusion power — if we’re willing to lean into incentives and free enterprise to encourage innovation.
